title: Track Awesome D3 Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome D3 (wbkd/awesome-d3) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A list of D3 libraries, plugins and utilities

items.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 09 - Jan 15, 2023
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jan 09 - Jan 15, 2023
items.content_text:
### Charts / Third Party

*   [Layer Cake (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/mhkeller/layercake) - A graphics framework built on top of Svelte.
*   [semiotic (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/nteract/semiotic) - A data visualization framework combining React & D3 \[scatter, line, area]
items.content_html:
Charts / Third Party

  • Layer Cake (⭐1.6k) - A graphics framework built on top of Svelte.
  • semiotic (⭐2.4k) - A data visualization framework combining React & D3 [scatter, line, area]

items.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Sep 24 - Sep 30, 2018
items.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Sep 24 - Sep 30, 2018
items.content_text:
### Charts

*   [d3-ez (⭐52)](https://github.com/jamesleesaunders/d3-ez) - Easy Reusable D3 Charts & Components \[bar, donut, pie, bubble, rose, heatmap]
*   [d3-flame-graph (⭐925)](https://github.com/spiermar/d3-flame-graph) - Flame graphs from hierarchical data
*   [d3-funnel (⭐333)](https://github.com/jakezatecky/d3-funnel) - A funnel and pyramid chart library
*   [d3plus (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/alexandersimoes/d3plus) - Extension library for easy creation of visualizations \[scatter, stacked, line, bar, pie, network, bubble, box, map]
*   [WebCola (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/tgdwyer/WebCola) - Layout for graph visualization and exploration

### Utils / Third Party

*   [d3-jetpack (⭐614)](https://github.com/gka/d3-jetpack) - Nifty convenience wrappers that speed up your daily work
items.content_html:
Charts

  • d3-ez (⭐52) - Easy Reusable D3 Charts & Components [bar, donut, pie, bubble, rose, heatmap]
  • d3-flame-graph (⭐925) - Flame graphs from hierarchical data
  • d3-funnel (⭐333) - A funnel and pyramid chart library
  • d3plus (⭐1.6k) - Extension library for easy creation of visualizations [scatter, stacked, line, bar, pie, network, bubble, box, map]
  • WebCola (⭐2.1k) - Layout for graph visualization and exploration

Utils / Third Party

  • d3-jetpack (⭐614) - Nifty convenience wrappers that speed up your daily work

items.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 22 - Jan 28, 2018
items.summary: 15 awesome projects updated on Jan 22 - Jan 28, 2018
items.content_text:
### Charts

*   [d3-gridding (⭐103)](https://github.com/romsson/d3-gridding) - Chart mockups using grids
*   [d3fc (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/d3fc/d3fc) - A collection of interactive chart components \[line, bar, stacked, scatter, candlestick, ohlc]
*   [d3panels (⭐27)](https://github.com/kbroman/d3panels) - Interactive charts with linked brushing \[dot, scatter, line, heatmap, histogram]
*   [D4 (⭐433)](https://github.com/heavysixer/d4) - Re-usable charts DSL \[bar, donut, line, scatter, stacked, waterfall]
*   [plottable (⭐3k)](https://github.com/palantir/plottable) - Flexible, interactive charts for the web \[area, bar, line, pie, scatter, stacked]
*   [rickshaw (⭐6.5k)](https://github.com/shutterstock/rickshaw) - Toolkit for creating interactive real-time graphs \[line, scatter, bar]
*   [vizabi (⭐271)](https://github.com/vizabi/vizabi) - A framework for building visual data exploration tools \[bubble, map, line, bar, sankey, donut]

### Charts / Third Party

*   [react-d3-components (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/codesuki/react-d3-components) - D3 Components \[bar, stacked, scatter, line, area, pie]
*   [react-d3-library (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/react-d3-library/react-d3-library) - Library to use D3 in React \[area, bar, line, pie, scatter]
*   [react-stockcharts (⭐4k)](https://github.com/rrag/react-stockcharts) - Highly customizable stock charts \[area, line, scatter, bubble, bar, stacked, candlestick]
*   [react-vis (⭐8.8k)](https://github.com/uber/react-vis) - A collection of react components to render visualizations \[area, bar, heatmap, line, scatter]

### Maps / Third Party

*   [d3-geo-polygon (⭐120)](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo-polygon) - Clipping and geometric operations for spherical polygons
*   [d3-geo-voronoi (⭐250)](https://github.com/Fil/d3-geo-voronoi) - Voronoi diagrams and Delaunay triangulation for the sphere
*   [d3-inertia (⭐66)](https://github.com/Fil/d3-inertia) - An extension to d3-drag that continues the mouse movement with some inertia
*   [react-simple-maps (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/zcreativelabs/react-simple-maps) - An SVG mapping component library for React, built on top of d3-geo \[map, geo]
items.content_html:
Charts

  • d3-gridding (⭐103) - Chart mockups using grids
  • d3fc (⭐1.3k) - A collection of interactive chart components [line, bar, stacked, scatter, candlestick, ohlc]
  • d3panels (⭐27) - Interactive charts with linked brushing [dot, scatter, line, heatmap, histogram]
  • D4 (⭐433) - Re-usable charts DSL [bar, donut, line, scatter, stacked, waterfall]
  • plottable (⭐3k) - Flexible, interactive charts for the web [area, bar, line, pie, scatter, stacked]
  • rickshaw (⭐6.5k) - Toolkit for creating interactive real-time graphs [line, scatter, bar]
  • vizabi (⭐271) - A framework for building visual data exploration tools [bubble, map, line, bar, sankey, donut]

Charts / Third Party

  • react-d3-components (⭐1.6k) - D3 Components [bar, stacked, scatter, line, area, pie]
  • react-d3-library (⭐1.5k) - Library to use D3 in React [area, bar, line, pie, scatter]
  • react-stockcharts (⭐4k) - Highly customizable stock charts [area, line, scatter, bubble, bar, stacked, candlestick]
  • react-vis (⭐8.8k) - A collection of react components to render visualizations [area, bar, heatmap, line, scatter]

Maps / Third Party

  • d3-geo-polygon (⭐120) - Clipping and geometric operations for spherical polygons
  • d3-geo-voronoi (⭐250) - Voronoi diagrams and Delaunay triangulation for the sphere
  • d3-inertia (⭐66) - An extension to d3-drag that continues the mouse movement with some inertia
  • react-simple-maps (⭐3.2k) - An SVG mapping component library for React, built on top of d3-geo [map, geo]

items.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 15 - Jan 21, 2018
items.summary: 24 awesome projects updated on Jan 15 - Jan 21, 2018
items.content_text:
### Charts

*   [cubism (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/square/cubism) - Time series visualization
*   [c3 (⭐9.4k)](https://github.com/c3js/c3) - Reusable chart library \[line, spline, step, area, stacked, bar, pie, donut]
*   [d2b (⭐98)](https://github.com/d2bjs/d2b) - Chart library for axis, pie, sankey, sunburst charts
*   [D3xter (⭐336)](https://github.com/NathanEpstein/D3xter) - Straight forward plotting \[plot, timeline, bar, histogram, pie]
*   [nvd3 (⭐7.2k)](https://github.com/novus/nvd3) - Re-usable charts and chart components \[box plot, buttlet, candlestick, line, bar, pie, scatter, sparkline]
*   [plotly.js (⭐18k)](https://github.com/plotly/plotly.js/) - High level charting library \[scatter, line, bar, pie, box plot, histogram, heatmap]
*   [taucharts (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/TargetProcess/tauCharts) - Charts with a focus on design and flexibility \[line, bar, area, stacked]
*   [xkcdgraphs (⭐444)](https://github.com/imkevinxu/xkcdgraphs) - Xkcd style graphs \[line]

### Charts / Third Party

*   [nivo (⭐14k)](https://github.com/plouc/nivo) - Dataviz components for React with isomorphic ability \[bar, line, area, bubble, chord, heatmap]
*   [victory (⭐11k)](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/victory) - Composable React components for building visualizations \[area, bar, candlestick, pie, line, scatter, voronoi]
*   [vx (⭐20k)](https://github.com/hshoff/vx) - Visualization components for React \[bar, line, scatter, stacked, area, pattern, heatmap, pie, radial, map, geo]

### Maps / Third Party

*   [d3-composite-projections (⭐98)](https://github.com/rveciana/d3-composite-projections) - Projections for showing countries' distant lands together
*   [d3-topogram (⭐325)](https://github.com/shawnbot/topogram) - Continuous area cartograms based on TopoJSON
*   [maptable (⭐60)](https://github.com/Packet-Clearing-House/maptable) - Convert datasets to a set of visual components (Map, Filters, Table)
*   [leaflet-d3 (⭐268)](https://github.com/Asymmetrik/leaflet-d3) - Collection of plugins for using D3 with Leaflet \[map, geo]
*   [Wikimaps-D3js Atlas (⭐47)](https://github.com/WikimapsAtlas/WikimapsAtlas-generator) - CLI to generate raster, topojson and svg maps \[map, geo]

### Utils / Third Party

*   [d3-lasso (⭐89)](https://github.com/skokenes/d3-lasso) - Tag elements by drawing a line over or around objects
*   [d3-nelson-rules (⭐17)](https://github.com/53seven/d3-nelson-rules) - Apply nelsons rules of process control to a set of data
*   [d3-tooltip (⭐12)](https://github.com/bumbeishvili/d3-tooltip) - Arrow shaped tooltip with shadows and dynamic content
*   [d3-xray (⭐26)](https://github.com/vijithassar/d3-xray) - Bookmarklet that logs results of the data joins as you mouse over
*   [textures (⭐6.1k)](https://github.com/riccardoscalco/textures) - SVG patterns for data visualization

### Miscellaneous / Third Party

*   [d3-force-gravity (⭐22)](https://github.com/sohamkamani/d3-force-gravity) - Implement gravitational attraction (or force-field-like repulsion)
*   [mermaid (⭐81k)](https://github.com/knsv/mermaid) - Generation of diagrams and flowcharts from text in a markdown style
*   [netvis (⭐17)](https://github.com/dborzov/netvis) - Visualize network communication for arbitrary protocols
items.content_html:
Charts

  • cubism (⭐4.9k) - Time series visualization
  • c3 (⭐9.4k) - Reusable chart library [line, spline, step, area, stacked, bar, pie, donut]
  • d2b (⭐98) - Chart library for axis, pie, sankey, sunburst charts
  • D3xter (⭐336) - Straight forward plotting [plot, timeline, bar, histogram, pie]
  • nvd3 (⭐7.2k) - Re-usable charts and chart components [box plot, buttlet, candlestick, line, bar, pie, scatter, sparkline]
  • plotly.js (⭐18k) - High level charting library [scatter, line, bar, pie, box plot, histogram, heatmap]
  • taucharts (⭐1.9k) - Charts with a focus on design and flexibility [line, bar, area, stacked]
  • xkcdgraphs (⭐444) - Xkcd style graphs [line]

Charts / Third Party

  • nivo (⭐14k) - Dataviz components for React with isomorphic ability [bar, line, area, bubble, chord, heatmap]
  • victory (⭐11k) - Composable React components for building visualizations [area, bar, candlestick, pie, line, scatter, voronoi]
  • vx (⭐20k) - Visualization components for React [bar, line, scatter, stacked, area, pattern, heatmap, pie, radial, map, geo]

Maps / Third Party

  • d3-composite-projections (⭐98) - Projections for showing countries' distant lands together
  • d3-topogram (⭐325) - Continuous area cartograms based on TopoJSON
  • maptable (⭐60) - Convert datasets to a set of visual components (Map, Filters, Table)
  • leaflet-d3 (⭐268) - Collection of plugins for using D3 with Leaflet [map, geo]
  • Wikimaps-D3js Atlas (⭐47) - CLI to generate raster, topojson and svg maps [map, geo]

Utils / Third Party

  • d3-lasso (⭐89) - Tag elements by drawing a line over or around objects
  • d3-nelson-rules (⭐17) - Apply nelsons rules of process control to a set of data
  • d3-tooltip (⭐12) - Arrow shaped tooltip with shadows and dynamic content
  • d3-xray (⭐26) - Bookmarklet that logs results of the data joins as you mouse over
  • textures (⭐6.1k) - SVG patterns for data visualization

Miscellaneous / Third Party

  • d3-force-gravity (⭐22) - Implement gravitational attraction (or force-field-like repulsion)
  • mermaid (⭐81k) - Generation of diagrams and flowcharts from text in a markdown style
  • netvis (⭐17) - Visualize network communication for arbitrary protocols

items.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Jan 08 - Jan 14, 2018
items.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Jan 08 - Jan 14, 2018
items.content_text:
### Charts

*   [dagre-d3 (⭐2.9k)](https://github.com/dagrejs/dagre-d3) - Layout directed graphs on the client-side
*   [dc.js (⭐7.4k)](https://github.com/dc-js/dc.js) - For heavy amounts of data

### Maps / Third Party

*   [d3-exploder (⭐93)](https://github.com/bsouthga/d3-exploder) - Lets you easily move and resize geographic features
*   [d3-geo-projection (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo-projection) - Extended geographic projections
*   [d3-geomap (⭐132)](https://github.com/yaph/d3-geomap) - Library for creating geographic maps
*   [simple-map-d3 (⭐114)](https://github.com/MinnPost/simple-map-d3) - Easy choropleth style maps

### Utils / Third Party

*   [swoopy-drag (⭐121)](https://github.com/1wheel/swoopy-drag) - Artisanal label placement for d3 graphics
items.content_html:
Charts

  • dagre-d3 (⭐2.9k) - Layout directed graphs on the client-side
  • dc.js (⭐7.4k) - For heavy amounts of data

Maps / Third Party

  • d3-exploder (⭐93) - Lets you easily move and resize geographic features
  • d3-geo-projection (⭐1.1k) - Extended geographic projections
  • d3-geomap (⭐132) - Library for creating geographic maps
  • simple-map-d3 (⭐114) - Easy choropleth style maps

Utils / Third Party

  • swoopy-drag (⭐121) - Artisanal label placement for d3 graphics

items.title: Awesome D3 Updates on Nov 27 - Dec 03, 2017
items.summary: 12 awesome projects updated on Nov 27 - Dec 03, 2017
items.content_text:
### Charts

*   [micropolar (⭐125)](https://github.com/biovisualize/micropolar/) - A polar chart library
*   [mpld3 (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/mpld3/mpld3) - Export matplotlib graphics to work in the Browser
*   [vega (⭐12k)](https://github.com/vega/vega) - A visualization grammar
*   [vega-lite (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/vega/vega-lite) - A high-level grammar of interactive graphics

### Charts / Third Party

*   [recharts (⭐26k)](https://github.com/recharts/recharts) - Re-designed charting library built with React

### Maps / Third Party

*   [datamaps (⭐3.8k)](https://github.com/markmarkoh/datamaps) - Customizable map visualizations in one file

### Utils / Third Party

*   [d3kit-timeline (⭐379)](https://github.com/kristw/d3kit-timeline) - Timeline component that labels do not overlap
*   [d3-breadcrumbs (⭐5)](https://github.com/bumbeishvili/d3-breadcrumbs) - Simplifies breadcrumbs usage
*   [d3-legend (⭐725)](https://github.com/susielu/d3-legend) - Legend helper

### Miscellaneous / Third Party

*   [chess-dataviz (⭐76)](https://github.com/ebemunk/chess-dataviz) - Chess dataviz library
*   [codeflower (⭐697)](https://github.com/fzaninotto/CodeFlower) - Bird's eye view of the whole code
*   [graph-scroll (⭐515)](https://github.com/1wheel/graph-scroll) - Simple scrolling events
